(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (PRP I))
    (VP
      (VP (VBP have)
        (VP (VBN been)
          (ADJP (JJ busy))
          (S
            (VP (VBG thinking)
              (PP (IN of)
                (NP
                  (NP (DT all) (NNS sorts))
                  (PP (IN of)
                    (NP (NN fun) (NNS things)))))))
          (S
            (VP (TO to)
              (VP (VB do)
                (PRT (RP over))
                (PP (IN at)
                  (NP (PRP$ our) (NNP Facebook) (NN fanpage))))))))
      (CC and)
      (ADVP (RB here))
      (VP (VBZ is)
        (NP (PRP$ my) (JJS latest) (NN idea))))
    (. .)))


nsubj(busy-4, I-1)
aux(busy-4, have-2)
cop(busy-4, been-3)
root(ROOT-0, busy-4)
xcomp(busy-4, thinking-5)
prep(thinking-5, of-6)
det(sorts-8, all-7)
pobj(of-6, sorts-8)
prep(sorts-8, of-9)
nn(things-11, fun-10)
pobj(of-9, things-11)
aux(do-13, to-12)
xcomp(busy-4, do-13)
prt(do-13, over-14)
prep(do-13, at-15)
poss(fanpage-18, our-16)
nn(fanpage-18, Facebook-17)
pobj(at-15, fanpage-18)
cc(busy-4, and-19)
advmod(busy-4, here-20)
cop(idea-24, is-21)
poss(idea-24, my-22)
amod(idea-24, latest-23)
conj(busy-4, idea-24)


(ROOT
  (PP (IN As)
    (NP (DT a) (NN blogger))))


root(ROOT-0, As-1)
det(blogger-3, a-2)
pobj(As-1, blogger-3)


(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (PRP I))
    (ADVP (RB sometimes))
    (VP (VBP get)
      (S
        (VP (TO to)
          (VP (VB do)
            (NP (NN fun) (NNS things))
            (PP (IN like)
              (S
                (VP (VBG designing)
                  (NP (DT a) (JJ new) (NN item))
                  (PP (IN for)
                    (NP (NNS restaurants))))))))))
    (, ,)))


nsubj(get-3, I-1)
advmod(get-3, sometimes-2)
root(ROOT-0, get-3)
aux(do-5, to-4)
xcomp(get-3, do-5)
nn(things-7, fun-6)
dobj(do-5, things-7)
prep(do-5, like-8)
pcomp(like-8, designing-9)
det(item-12, a-10)
amod(item-12, new-11)
dobj(designing-9, item-12)
prep(designing-9, for-13)
pobj(for-13, restaurants-14)


(ROOT
  (FRAG
    (PP (IN like)
      (NP
        (NP (DT the) (JJ ieat) (NN Superburger))
        (PP (IN for)
          (NP (NN example)))))
    (, ,)))


root(ROOT-0, like-1)
det(Superburger-4, the-2)
amod(Superburger-4, ieat-3)
pobj(like-1, Superburger-4)
prep(Superburger-4, for-5)
pobj(for-5, example-6)


(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (WDT which))
    (VP (VBZ is)
      (ADVP (RB now))
      (NP
        (NP (DT a) (JJ standard) (NN item))
        (PP (IN in)
          (NP (NNP Astons) (NNS restaurants)))))
    (. .)))


nsubj(item-6, which-1)
cop(item-6, is-2)
advmod(item-6, now-3)
det(item-6, a-4)
amod(item-6, standard-5)
root(ROOT-0, item-6)
prep(item-6, in-7)
nn(restaurants-9, Astons-8)
pobj(in-7, restaurants-9)
